subject: Math
description: Solve real-world and mathematical problems by writing and solving equations of the form x + p = q for cases in which p, q and x are all nonnegative rational numbers.

subject: Math
description: Know precise definitions of angle, circle, perpendicular line, parallel line, and line segment, based on the undefined notions of point, line, distance along a line, and distance around a circular arc.

subject: Science
description: Moving objects have kinetic energy and objects may have potential energy due to their relative positions.

subject: Science
description: The expression for the kinetic energy of an object is 1/2mv^2.

subject: Business
description: Analyze the role of business in the economic system.

subject: Law
description: Understand the elements of a crime.

subject: English
description: Print many upper- and lowercase letters.

subject: English
description: Use frequently occurring nouns and verbs.
